entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
